altercluster.name: AlterCluster
altercluster.description: Grants permission to alter various aspects of the cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's ALTER CLUSTER ACL

alterclusterdynamicconfiguration.name: AlterClusterDynamicConfiguration
alterclusterdynamicconfiguration.description: Grants permission to alter the dynamic configuration of a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's ALTER_CONFIGS CLUSTER ACL

altergroup.name: AlterGroup
altergroup.description: Grants permission to join groups on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's READ GROUP ACL

altertopic.name: AlterTopic
altertopic.description: Grants permission to alter topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's ALTER TOPIC ACL

altertopicdynamicconfiguration.name: AlterTopicDynamicConfiguration
altertopicdynamicconfiguration.description: Grants permission to alter the dynamic configuration of topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's ALTER_CONFIGS TOPIC ACL

altertransactionalid.name: AlterTransactionalId
altertransactionalid.description: Grants permission to alter transactional IDs on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's WRITE TRANSACTIONAL_ID ACL

connect.name: Connect
connect.description: Grants permission to connect and authenticate to the cluster

createtopic.name: CreateTopic
createtopic.description: Grants permission to create topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's CREATE CLUSTER/TOPIC ACL

deletegroup.name: DeleteGroup
deletegroup.description: Grants permission to delete groups on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DELETE GROUP ACL

deletetopic.name: DeleteTopic
deletetopic.description: Grants permission to delete topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DELETE TOPIC ACL

describecluster.name: DescribeCluster
describecluster.description: Grants permission to describe various aspects of the cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE CLUSTER ACL

describeclusterdynamicconfiguration.name: DescribeClusterDynamicConfiguration
describeclusterdynamicconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the dynamic configuration of a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE_CONFIGS CLUSTER ACL

describegroup.name: DescribeGroup
describegroup.description: Grants permission to describe groups on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE GROUP ACL

describetopic.name: DescribeTopic
describetopic.description: Grants permission to describe topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE TOPIC ACL

describetopicdynamicconfiguration.name: DescribeTopicDynamicConfiguration
describetopicdynamicconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the dynamic configuration of topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE_CONFIGS TOPIC ACL

describetransactionalid.name: DescribeTransactionalId
describetransactionalid.description: Grants permission to describe transactional IDs on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE TRANSACTIONAL_ID ACL

readdata.name: ReadData
readdata.description: Grants permission to read data from topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's READ TOPIC ACL

writedata.name: WriteData
writedata.description: Grants permission to write data to topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's WRITE TOPIC ACL

writedataidempotently.name: WriteDataIdempotently
writedataidempotently.description: Grants permission to write data idempotently on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's IDEMPOTENT_WRITE CLUSTER ACL
